entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Filebar - media player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Filebar Pro LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫399,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Filebar Pro LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

# Filebar Filebar is a modern multimedia player that offers video player, music player, cloud services and file management features. ## Main features ### Video player Filebar offers a powerful video player that allows you to play more video formats, including standard MP4, M4V and MOV, plus MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, OMG, OGV, 3GP, RMVB and more. You can browse and play videos from your mac, pc, NAS, FTP, and also support playing videos from media servers (such as Emby/Plex/Jellyfin media server), and you can also play videos from cloud services. ### Music Player Filebar provides a nice local music player for playing local and cloud music, supported audio formats are MP3/M4A/FLAC. ### Cloud Services Cloud services are another core feature of Filebar. With Filebar you can easily manage cloud services, including creating folders/deleting/playing/batch renaming/viewing information. It also provides support for remote protocols. The supported protocols are SMB, WebDAV, Synology, FTP, SFTP. ### File Management Filebar also provides a file manager. You can manage your local and remote files: move, delete, edit, copy, upload, batch rename, etc. ## Customer Support Feel free to contact us if your have any suggestions or ideas. - Website: https://fileball.app - Email: filebox.app@outlook.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

  • 6480 GoldÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99

Application Description

== Featured in the App Store in 160 countries and regions. == == Repeatedly recommended as Game of the Day in the App Store. == In the distant "Planet", planets burst and civilizations collapse. The residents who lost their "Home" wander above within The Ring. For survival and hope, a group of "Hunters" gather, embarking on an exploration and mission across the shattered continents... ‚Äî Will you become the hunter or the hunted? Your battle decides the future of the planet! ** Game Features ** - Retro and refined pixel style, returning to the "original intention". - Control three characters in real-time for exhilarating combat! - Pixel characters + full body part customization, appearance changes with gear! - Skill combinations + elemental Combos, diverse strategic options! - Classic gear matching + Set skills activation, great Hunters have more than one trick! - No "Energy" limits + unlimited Resource gathering, truly free exploration. - Bizarre Monsters + immensely powerful giant beast Bosses, a challenging adventure on an alien Planet! - Rich character stories + diverse in-depth development, 8+ Hunters take you roaming through the Planet! ------ A Word from the Developers ------ It's been 5 years since the release of our last game "Brutal Street 2" "Creation" is not easy, and innovating while continuing the legacy is even harder, "Home, Planet, and Hunter" has been a labor of love, and we hope you'll like it. From: The 12 buddies at Black Pearl Games Follow us on social media: https://discord.gg/QYpbhswpZu Facebook: www.facebook.com/BlackPearlGames X/twitter: twitter.com/bpgames321 Ins: www.instagram.com/blackpearlgames Threads: www.threads.net/@blackpearlgames

entry.title: Dark Reader for Safari
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Dark Reader is an eye-care Safari extension that enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. It inverts bright colors to make web pages high contrast and easier to read. Dark Reader integrates seamlessly with system dark mode. Adjust brightness and contrast to match your display and ambient lighting. Enable dark mode on every web page or give websites a sepia tone. Select from multiple color theme presets or create your own by customizing background and text colors. Enable or disable Dark Reader for specific websites, automatically sync with system dark mode, or detect already dark websites and leave them unchanged. Developed by the original creators of Dark Reader. Since 2014, we continuously evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support for people sensitive to bright light. A single purchase includes access to the macOS version (Safari browser) when using the same iCloud account. Dark Reader contains no ads and does not collect user data. Enable Dark Reader in Safari preferences and disable similar extensions to prevent conflicts. Enjoy browsing!

Application Description

RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES! Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history! Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you‚Äôre out of office‚Äîmaintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices‚Äîevery decision is yours! ‚Ä¢ Swipe & Decide ‚Äì Instant control, deep consequence. ‚Ä¢ Triple Balance System ‚Äì People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green. ‚Ä¢ Chain Cards ‚Äì Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future. ‚Ä¢ Adventure Cards ‚Äì Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends. ‚Ä¢ Character Stories ‚Äì Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief‚Ä¶ each NPC steers you to a different ending. ‚Ä¢ Endless Replayability ‚Äì Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new. LAUNCH DISCOUNT ‚Äî NOW LIVE! Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

entry.title: Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫149,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • VIP versionÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Are you ready to become the ultimate screw master? Welcome to Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood, the most addictive and fun screw puzzle game of the year! If you are a fan of logic puzzles, brain teasers, and the satisfying sound of wood, this game is made for you. Dive into a world of challenging mechanics where your mission is simple yet tricky: unscrew the pins, remove the nuts and bolts, and clear the wood plates to solve the jam. It sounds easy, but as you progress, the levels become a true IQ test! KEY FEATURES: Engaging Gameplay: Enjoy the classic mechanic of nuts and bolts. Strategically unscrew the pins to make the wood bars fall. Wood Theme & ASMR: Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of wood. Listen to the satisfying ASMR sounds of metal screws hitting the wooden board. Brain Training: Hundreds of levels designed to boost your logic. From simple warm-ups to complex hard puzzles, challenge your mind every day. Custom Skins: Unlock unique skins for your screws, nuts, and bolts. Customize your board for a fresh experience. Global Leaderboard: Compete with friends and players worldwide to see who solves the screw jam the fastest. HOW TO PLAY: Tap to unscrew the nuts and bolts from the wood plates. Move the screws to the empty holes strategically to avoid a pin jam. Drop all the wood plates to clear the level and win rewards. Use hints if you get stuck on a tricky screw puzzle. Whether you want to relax after a long day or challenge your brain with a tough logic game, Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood is the perfect choice. Experience the thrill of solving the ultimate wood puzzle! Download now and start unscrewing! Can you solve the jam?

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫29,99 [‚Ç∫29,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99

Application Description

Inspect papers, prevent smuggling‚Äîkeep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

Application Description

Refer to The third edition of the book, covering content: 2. Getting Started: Insertion sort, Merge sort; 4. Divide-and-Conquer: Maximum-subarray, Matrix Multiplication[normal, recursive, Strassen‚Äôs algorithm]; 6. Heapsort: Heapsort[max-heap, min-heap]; 7. Quicksort: Quicksort; 8. Sorting in Linear Time: Counting sort; 12. Binary Search Trees: Binary search tree[Inorder Walk, Search Recursive, Search Iterative, Minimum Iterative, Maximum Iterative, Successor, Predecessor, Insert, Delete]; 13. Red-Black Trees: Red Black Tree[Insert, Delete]; 15. Dynamic Programming: Rod cutting[Recursive, Top_down, Bottom_up, Print],Longest common subsequence; 16. Greedy Algorithms: Acitivity selection[Recursive, Iterative],Huffman codes; 22. Elementary Graph: Breadth-first search, Depth-first search, Topological sort, Strongly connected components; 23. Minimum Spanning Trees: Minimum spanning tree[Kruskal‚Äôs algorithmÔºåPrim‚Äôs algorithm]; 24. Single-Source Shortest Paths: The Bellman-Ford algorithmÔºåDAG algorithmÔºåDijkstra‚Äôs algorithm; 25. All-pairs Shortest Paths: All-pairs Shortest paths algorithms[SlowÔºåFasterÔºåThe Floyd-Warshall algorithm]; 26. Maximum Flow: The Ford-Fulkerson algorithm; Addition: Tower of HanoiÔºåN Queens ProblemÔºåComparison of sorting algorithms; The primary features: You can run the pseudo-code single step or continuous, observe the change of parameters and data structuresÔºåit can help you to understand the design thought of the algorithm; You can set breakpoints in program and ovserve the status of breakpoint, it can help you to understand why this algorithm is corrcet by using loop invariants; With running-time function stacks and the returning positionsÔºåyou can track the running process of recursive functions easily, and understand the operation mechanism of computer programs; By recording the performed times of the pseudo-codes can help you to understand the running time of algorithms; I wish this app can be helpful to you;

Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game! ‚Ä¢ SPECIAL MODES ‚Äì Play Texas Hold'em with a twist: make super combinations with jokers, peek at your opponent's cards, play high cards only, get pocket pairs and much more! ‚Ä¢ MTT TOURNAMENTS ‚Äì The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Play blackjack, Omaha poker, roulette, baccarat, slots, video poker, craps, Split Bet Poker and Set Poker‚Äîall in one application! ‚Ä¢ VIP LEVELS ‚Äì Get huge bonuses and exclusive access to the latest in-game features! ‚Ä¢ FAIR PLAY GUARANTEED¬†‚Äì All our games use a Random Number Generator (RNG) and are certified by independent experts. Our simple-to-follow tutorial mode will help you take the first steps. ‚Ä¢ NO REGISTRATION¬†‚Äì Get straight into the action.
